text: Herbert Wahler (10 December 1921 â€“ November 2023) was a German centenarian and accused Nazi. He took part of the Einsatzgruppe C and was accused of being involved in the massacre of Jews in Ukraine at Babi Yar. He was added in the list of most-wanted Nazi war criminals in 2018. In March 2020, the public prosecutor's office said that Wahler would not face charges because of a lack of evidence. He turned 100 in December 2021. Wahler died in Melsungen, Germany in November 2023, at the age of 101. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2023 deaths Category:German centenarians Category:Nazis Category:German military personnel of World War II
title: Herbert Wahler
